member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies configuration flags for HEVC video encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAG_ALLOW_REQUEST_INTRA_CONSTRAINED_SLICES
member.summary: Allows the usage of the intra constrained slices flag in picture control. This mode restricts the motion vector search range to the region box of the current slice, i.e. motion vectors outside the slice boundary can't be used.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAG_ENABLE_SAO_FILTER
member.summary: Enables the sample adaptive offset filter.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAG_ENABLE_LONG_TERM_REFERENCES
member.summary: Enables the usage of long term references in the picture reference management structures for HEVC.

summary.para: Note If was reported, this flag must be enabled.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_CONFIGURATION_HEVC_FLAG_USE_CONSTRAINED_INTRAPREDICTION
member.summary: Enables constrained intra prediction. This refers to constrained_intra_pred_flag in the PPS.
